Archdiocese nke Lyon (Latin: Archidiœcesis Lugdunensis; French: Archidiocèse de Lyon), onye bụbu Archdiocese nke Lyon–Vienne–Embrun, bụ nnukwu ụlọ ụka Latịn mepere emepe nke Ụka Katọlik na France.  Ndị Achịbishọp nke Lyon na-eje ozi dị ka ndị nọchiri anya Saint Pothinus na Saint Irenaeus, ndị bishọp nke mbụ na nke abụọ nke Lyon, n’otu n’otu, ma a na-akpọkwa ya Primate of the Gauls.  A na-ebuli ya elu ruo n'ọkwa nke Kadịnal.  Bishọp Olivier de Germay ka a họpụtara Archbishọp nke Lyon na 22 October 2020.
